circumstances: While in cruising altitude, the crew encountered poor weather conditions when control was lost. The airplane crashed near Fowler and was destroyed, killing all three occupants. The wreckage was found a day later.
probable_cause:
Loss of control caused by icing conditions. The following factors were reported: 
- Inadequate weather briefing, 
- Airframe ice, 
- Aircraft equipped with deicing system but usage undetermined.
